name: 丽莎·阿尔登霍温
name_full: 丽莎·阿尔登霍温 Lisa Aldenhoven
introduction: Lisa Aldenhoven is an Australian actress born in Melbourne in 1959. Her first television role was as "Sally Lee" in the opening episode of Prisoner - from there she was written into The Young Doctors where she played Julie Holland for almost three years. Various guest roles followed in both television and feature films including The Getting of Wisdom, Mad Max and Brilliant Lies. She then joined the corporate world working for some of Australia's top companies including Amcor and News Limited where she was launched Victoria's Sunday Herald and was brand manager for Australia's largest selling news paper - the Herald Sun. She has recently returned to her first passion - acting. Her most recent role was "Lesley Taylor" in Neighbours
